functions.name: check_bill_status
functions.description: Retrieve current or past billing details for a customer.

account_number.description: Unique identifier for the customer's account.

bill_month.description: Month for which the bill is requested (format: YYYY-MM).

functions.name: make_payment
functions.description: Submit a payment for a specific account using a saved or new method.

account_number.description: Customer account number to apply the payment.

payment_method_id.description: Reference ID for the saved payment method (optional if new).

functions.name: report_outage
functions.description: Log a service outage reported by a customer.

functions.name: troubleshoot_router
functions.description: Initiate remote diagnostics and offer router fixes.

mac_address.description: MAC address of the router or modem.

issue_description.description: Description of the issue reported by the customer.

functions.name: update_account_info
functions.description: Update customer account information such as phone or email.

field_to_update.description: Field the customer wants to update.

new_value.description: The new value for the specified field.

functions.name: schedule_technician
functions.description: Book or reschedule a technician visit.

issue_type.description: Short label for the issue (e.g., 'No Internet').
